    • setPerspective

    • networkMessageReceived

      public void networkMessageReceived​(NetworkDataObject ndo)
      Description copied from interface: NetworkListener
      Called when data is received from other connected clients, or from the server itself. It might be unwise to process the message inside your implementation of this method, as you could have issues with threading (this method will be called using the Swing Event Dispatch Thread). Instead, consider calling NetworkMessenger's getQueuedMessages() method somewhere inside your standard game/program loop to get all messages that have been received. Also note - even though this method is called when you received messages, the messages are still stored in the message queue until you remove them.
      Specified by:
      networkMessageReceived in interface NetworkListener
      Parameters:
      ndo - The data that was received.
